title: tobibeer/setvars
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/setvars
cpl.name: setvars
cpl.description: Set multiple, complex variables based on attributes, filters, or conditionals
cpl.readme:
The plugin`$:/plugins/tobibeer/setvars` provides:

`<$setvars/>`
a widget to declare multiple variables while joining a range of attribute values
allows basic conditional expressions using OR logic or IF clauses

Provides the widget `<$setvars>`...

!! Usage

```
<$setvars
_attr1=<<currentTiddler>>
_attr2={{!!title}}
_attr3="1 2 3"
_attr4="[all[current]tagging[]]"
var1="attr1 \ = literal = \ attr2"
var2="attr3[n] \ \ [attr4[1,2][when-empty]] \ \ [attr3[][][ - ]]"
var3="if(attr1 ? [attr4]) || attr3 attr2"
var4="if(attr1 == attr2 ? attr3[1]) || [attr3[2]]">

* <<var1>>
* <<var2>>
* <<var3>>
* <<var4>>

</$setvars>
```
